properties.name: company
properties.description: The name of the company (e.g – amazon)

properties.name: firstname
properties.description: First name of the person (e.g – Marc)

properties.name: lastname
properties.description: Last name of the person (e.g – Benioff)

properties.name: resource
properties.description: Company API lets you lookup company data via a domain name or company name

properties.name: Person
properties.description: Person API lets you lookup a person based on an email address OR based on a domain name + first name + last name
